participant_1.name: Jessica
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and creative, Jessica loves exploring new ideas and activities. She's passionate about animals and enjoys the thrill of competitive sports.
participant_1.background: i've three dogs. i like to watch the olympics. i'm in an open polyamorous relationship. i also have a dog walking business. my father was a door to door salesman.

participant_2.name: Michael
participant_2.personality: Caring and insightful, Michael has a warm demeanor and enjoys sharing his knowledge with others. He has a passion for helping those in need and loves to reminisce about his teaching days.
participant_2.background: cheeseburgers are my favorite food. i was poor growing up. i am a retired gym teacher. i volunteer at a soup kitchen. i like watching war documentaries.

content.text: Project Runway All Stars... This week's challenge is to find a muse to inspire a fashionforward look.
